title: First Post & What's to Come
description: The rantings of an inexperienced blog poster.

main_info.paragraph: A formal intro to this site would seem very bland. I'll make this section short enough so you won't lull over how generic this post will be. I'm Ding, I go by Ding, Dingy, or Dingyboy as my friends would call me. I'm a freelancer which is to say that I quit my job as a front-end software developer and now I'm working on some of my personal projects.
So, what is the plan now Ding?
Good question. Graduate school is high on the priority list and I'll be applying in the coming Fall. In the meantime, I'll be building my portfolio and showcasing/ no-shame bragging on my website.
All right, short and sweet like I said. Now, I've never been good with farewells so... That'll do for now, pig.
